summary: VoiceDictationButton now shows an additional “live” listening indicator (animated ping ring + solid dot) when isListening is true, preserves tooltip start/stop messaging, and adds accessibility semantics (aria-pressed + sr-only aria-live status text). No backend or Shadcn UI source files were modified in the diff shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state tracking updates (project_state.json) unrelated to the requested UI/accessibility behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for UI cue and accessibility semantics; it does not request updating project tracking JSON.
